import axios from 'axios' import { useState } from "react" import Navbar from "./Navbar" import Sidebar from "./Sidebar" import Popup from 'reactjs-popup'; import { FaRupeeSign } from 'react-icons/fa'; function Order({url}){ const [orders,setOrders]=useState([]) const [email,setEmail]=useState('') const flist=async ()=>{ const res= await axios.post(`${url}/corders`,{email:email}) if(res.status===200){ setOrders(res.data) alert(orders[0].tamt) }} const handleC=()=>{ flist() } return(<>

enter email
